entry.et: Latin exsistere to come into being, exist, from ex- + sistere to stand, stop; akin to Latin stare to stand stand

def.dt: :to have real being whether material or spiritual did unicorns exist the largest galaxy known to exist
:to have being in a specified place or with respect to understood limitations or conditions strange ideas existed in his mind
:to continue to be racism still exists in society
:to have life or the functions of vitality we cannot exist without oxygen
:to live at an inferior level or under adverse circumstances the hungry existing from day to day
